txt.en: 'Even now it stirs...no matter to me, for I would gladly share a meal such as you with my pet.'
'The goblins speak the truth. The Beast stirs without the soothing sound of the drums.'
'Prepare yourself, morsels. Without the drums the Beast will wake, then death will come swiftly!'
'No! The Beast must hear the drums to sleep. I must flee!'
